summary: Most frontend page structure and routing appear implemented: persistent SiteLayout with header/nav + footer, five pages (Home/About/Menu/Gallery/Contact), warm theme variables in CSS, and local-asset image references for logo/hero/gallery. However, the diff summary does not show the required generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and it introduces Internet Identity/auth and backend actor scaffolding that were not requested for a static informational site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with specified filenames, and render them in the UI (logo in header; gallery uses local static assets).
missing_requirements.reason: UI code references the expected image paths, but the diff summary does not include any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the acceptance criteria about the images existing in the repo is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and actor creation hooks (React Query actor management) added to the app bootstrap.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest describes a static informational restaurant website and explicitly says authentication is not required; adding II integration and actor logic is not requested by any REQ.
Non-goals specify no backend data storage is required for this static informational website; no backend features are requested in REQ-1..REQ-8.
